question: Mikasa is worth a thousand ordinary soldiers.

Floch believed in his devils
Who said it? If you win, you live. If you lose, you die. If you don't fight, you can't win.
Who said it? I Am Strong. Stronger Than All Of You. Extremely Strong. I Can Kill All The Titans Out There. Even If I Am Alone
Who said it? The world is a cruel but it's also very beautiful
Who said it? Eren, Thank you for wrapping the scarf around me
Who said it? I don't have time to worry whether it's right or wrong. You can't hope for a horror story with a happy ending! Yeah, it's a cruel world out there.
Who said it? Keep moving forward. Even if you die. Even after you die
Who said it? Our Devils are our only hope
Who said it? I might be nothing more than a fodder. I'm sure my only purpose is to be expendable. But even a piece of fodder should at least have the right to call it like he sees it!
Who said it? There's a devil inside of us all and that's why the world turned out this way.
Who said it? If You Think It's Natural For People To Die For Others. I'm Sure You'll Understand That At Times, The Sacrifice Of A Single Precious Life Can Save Many Others
Who said it? My Speciality Is Carving Flesh. Anyone Interested In Experiencing My Skill Firsthand, Step Right Up.

Who said it? There are only so many lives that I actually care about. My Enemies made deciding that easy six years ago. So you're mistaken to seek any compassion from me. Because right now, I'm all out of time and room in my heart to care.
Who said it? Once I'm dead, I won't even be able to remember you. So I'll win, no matter what. I'll live, no matter what!
Who said it? That's right… This world… is cruel. It hit me that living was like a miracle
Who said it? A cruel world where only the victors can survive
Who said it? That's right… This world… is cruel. It hit me that living was like a miracle
Who said it? However, no matter the world you make, you cannot stop Eren's death. Because Death is ingrained within his body. No matter how much you try to protect him, death will snare him.
Who said it? You must become strong and return to your world.
Who said it? I am no one. And I am Everyone
Who said it? You are a lost child. Unable to accept Eren's death, you created this world to get lost in

Who said it? We're all free from the moment we're born. It doesn't matter how strong the opposition is. There doesn't need to be flaming water or land made of ice. Those who witness the outside world are free like no other.
Who said it? Fight. My life is second to that desire. It doesn't matter how fearsome the world is. It doesn't matter how cruel the world is. Fight.
Who said it? If someone aims to take away my freedom, I won't hesitate to take away theirs first
Who said it? Ever since I was born...I've always been me

Who said it? Is it wrong not to be special? I don't think that way. When it comes to my child... it's fine if he's never great . He doesn't have to be better than anyone. After all, just look at him. He's so cute! He's already special. Because he was ... born into this world.
Who said it? Because I was born into this world
Who said it? What is the point if those with the means and power do not fight?
Who said it? If you think reality is just living comfortably and following your own whims, can you seriously dare to call yourself a soldier
Who said it? I can do this! No...we can do this! Because we've all been special since the day we were born! We're free!
Who said it? I want to see and understand the world outside. I don't want to die inside these walls without knowing what's out there!
Who said it? Nothing can suppress a human's curiosity
Who said it? I'll wrap it around you again... as many times as you want. Now and forever.
Who said it? I'm the same as you. I didn't have any other choice.
Who said it? You have the freedom to defend the world's freedom and I have the freedom to continue moving forward.
Who said it? I'll kill them all! I'll wipe every last one of them off the face of this earth!
Who said it? You damn traitors!

Who said it? If people knew it would come to this, nobody would go to war. But most people are pushed by something, forced to march into hell. That 'something' wasn't their choice. Their situation or others made them do it. But people who push their own backs see a different kind of hell. They can see something beyond the hell. It might be hope. It may even be another hell. Only those who keep moving forward will ever know.
Who said it? There's no time to figure out if this the right thing to do! Just move - Don't try to keep your hands clean. That's right, the world is cruel.
Who said it? No matter how messed up things get, you can always figure out the best solution.
Who said it? I disposed of some dangerous beasts. Mere animals that just happened to resemble humans.
Who said it? It's not me or the commander who's going to save humanity. It's Armin!!
Who said it? I'm free. No matter what I do or how I do it, I'm acting of my own free will.
Who said it? You're all free.
Who said it? Even if I'm dead, their lives will go on. I want them to live long, happy lives.
Who said it? I knew you were more of a hero than anyone else
Who said it? Because I'm an Idiot. A garden variety idiot who got his hands on power.
Who said it? You're Only Resorting To Physical Abuse Because You Can't Prove That I'm Wrong
Who said it? Those who can't abandon anything, can't change anything
Who said it? In order to rise above monsters you must be willing to throw aside your humanity.
Who said it? From the day I was born they were always just there, wherever I looked... those miserable walls. Flaming water, land made of ice and sandy snowfields..
Who said it? I'd rather die than become a burden
Who said it? I don't like the terms good person or bad person because it is impossible to be entirely good to everyone. To some, you are a good person, while to others, you are a bad person.
Who said it? I refuse to standby with clean hands
Who said it? The world hasn't become hell...It's always been hell where the strong feed upon weak. It's such an obligingly simple rule. Except in this world, my friends tried to be strong.
Who said it? I think there are times people have to die... even if I don't like it.
Who said it? I am a soldier! And I have dedicated my heart to the restoration of humanity. Nothing would make me prouder than dying for such a noble cause!
Who said it? We're going to explore the outside world someday, right? Far beyond these walls, there's flaming water, land made of ice, and fields of san spread wide
Who said it? You know, because I'm just not the hero type.
Who said it? I didn't lose, because I didn't run.
Who said it? When people are faced with a situation they don't understand, it's easy for fear to take hold
Who said it? But with enough time, If we set aside our labels and see each other as people, we can understand each other.
Who said it? Eren, In what way are you free?
Who said it? We'll suffer for the sin of killing eighty percent of humanity, Together.
Who said it? Everyone Had To Be Drunk On Somethin' To Keep Pushing On … Everyone Was A Slave To Somethin'
Who said it? We've got to keep the young-uns out of the forest. Otherwise, ain't nothin' gonna stop it from happening again. That's why it's up to us adults to shoulder the sins of the past.
Who said it? Escape the forest. Even if we can't, we've gotta keep trying
Who said it? I've killed a lot of people. So that people would praise me. That's the devil within me
Who said it? Give up on your dream and die.
Who said it? Even if I believe in myself, or the choices of my trusted comrades but no one ever knows how it will turn out. You should just do your best to make a decision you won't regret.
Who said it? No casualties, Don't you dare die!
Who said it? Don't get me wrong you will never be Erwin's replacement but... I know you have a strength that nobody else has but you,
Who said it? The world without titans we dreamed of was supposed to be an astoundngly joyful place. An Ideal world.
Who said it? Don't, you'll regret it. If you begin to regret it, you'll dull your future decisions and let others make your choices for you
Who said it? Nobody can foretell the outcome, therefore, each decision you make, holds meaning only be effecting your next decision.

Who said it? Everything that you thought had meaning: Every hope, dream, or moment of happiness. None of it matters as you lie bleeding out on the battlefield. None of it changes what a speeding rock does to a body, we all die.
Who said it? My soldiers push forward! My soldiers scream out! My soldiers RAAAAAGE!
Who said it? One day, We'll Break it down. This Wall hiding the truth will fall.
Who said it? There Is No Future Where Humanity Can Inhabit These Lands Without Eren.
Who said it? Humanity will never stop fighting itself until it shrinks to a size of one or fewer
Who said it? When necessary, We must be willing to take big risks, and be prepared to lose everything.

Who said it? Can you see them too? Our comrades… They are all standing around us. They have been watching us all this time… They wanna know what we did with the sacrifices that they made…What became of the hearts they gave… But that's probably just in my head, right?
Who said it? But is pride worth dying for? What's so wrong with submission? Isn't it better than dying like this?
Who said it? If Eren dies, Paradis will drown in a sea of blood
Who said it? The one who will save Eldia is...me!
Who said it? I can't kick the bucket just yet. Eldia's restoration is finally at hand
Who said it?  I didn't care if people lived or died. I didn't think any life had value, including my own
Who said it? I wish I could've stayed locked up in my room with my ears covered but...those ashes of the dead would never forgive me.
Who said it? If we run and hide, What will we have left?
Who said it? A know-it-all wouldn't get how idiots work
Who said it? I wanna be a soldier my mom could take pride in
Who said it? Genocide is wrong! There is no reason to commend such an act!
Who said it? Nothing can take the violence out of people. Right Captain?
Who said it? I am a descendant of Royal blood!
Who said it? I'll Free The People Of The World From Their Fear Of The Titans And I'll Free The Eldians From Their Suffering.
Who said it? It Isn't Your Fault That We Were Born To That Disgusting Monster Of A Man. I will fix you with the Founding titan's power.
Who said it? What nice weather... If only I had thought of that eariler well.. I suppose that's too much to ask for after all the killing I've done
Who said it? I'll be waiting for you. In hell.
Who said it? You traitors! Aren't we all friends?!
Who said it? Someone has to be the one to stain their hands with blood
Who said it? This sure is a peculiar feeling. I'm not scared at all for once. And I see everything clearly
Who said it? None Of You Have Done Anything Wrong. And You're Not Devils. It's Just That You All Have To Die. That's just the way it is.
Who said it? Defend our island to the death! Our country!
Who said it? The only sure way to end this cycle of revenge fueled by hate is to bury our hate filled history along with civilization itself
Who said it? I'm starting to hate all of humanity! I say let them get wiped out by Titans! And if that makes me an enemy of humanity, so be it! I don't care if I'm the worst girl who ever lived!
Who said it? I'll fight them with you, so let me out of your hand! I don't care if there's something you can't tell me. No matter what happens... I will always be your ally!
Who said it? It's wrong to make you bear the sins of the past due to your race

Who said it? Going against the flow... takes a lot of courage. I respect that. Maybe people who can do it are just stupid, but... Well... What I'm sure of is that people like that are rare. So you can't call them common. You can't call them normal, either. People like you... get called special.
Who said it? If Somebody Told You To Die, Would You
Who said it? I Guess You Were Lucky That I Was A Good Person To You. It Looks Like Your Gamble Paid Off For Now But This Is Where Mine Begins
Who said it? I want to survive and see her again. As a person, I'm really lower than sh*t, but she knows that, and she smiles kindly at me anyway.
Who said it? There was one thing I wished for with all my heart. If I'm ever given a second chance in life, I want to live for only myself. That is my sincere wish.
Who said it? Do you always want to live hiding behind the mask you put up for the sake of others? You're you, and there's nothing wrong with that
Who said it? If We Turn Our Back On Hunting We Turn Our Back On Who We Are
Who said it? When I learned that humanity lived outside the walls... I was so disappointed.

Who said it? I...would choose to have never been born, if it was up to me. I've hated my blood. More than anyone else...I wished for the extinction of all Eldians. ...but I do not wish to die. Because...I was born into this world.

Who said it? I...would choose to have never been born, if it was up to me. I've hated my blood. More than anyone else...I wished for the extinction of all Eldians. ...but I do not wish to die. Because...I was born into this world.

Mikasa takes her scarf off whenever it is too hot and she takes well care of it by washing it as well with warm water
Why does Levi care so much about cleanliness?
answers: Because he lived in a filthy brothel with his mother
Because he's traumatized by the filth in the underground city

question: Who did Isayama base Mikasa's appearance off of?
answers: While working his part-time job at a net cafe, He saw a women with a scarf and hairstyle and eyes like Mikasa
answer: While working his part-time job at a net cafe, He saw a women with a scarf and hairstyle and eyes like Mikasa

Saying tatakae to himself in the mirror before recording

question: It took Arifumi Imai Four Months To Animate The Levi Vs. Beast Titan Fight in the RTS Arc
Isayama Always Intended For Eren To Become A Villain
Levi strangles Historia in the manga and forces her to become the queen
Who was first to discover the female titan's true identity?
What is the name of the real life worm that Isayama took inspiration from for the source of all living matter that Ymir came into contact with?
Who said it? I don't know why but when it comes to taking back freedom...Strength flows through me
Who said it? For some reason, when I think of the outside world, courage flows through me
Who said it? I've never heard of a titan killing another titan. I felt a glimmer of exhilaration... I felt the rage of humanity itself was embodied in what I saw
Who said it? You Do What You Have To Do. Just Keep Moving. That's How It Works, Right?
Who said it? I'm Sick And Tired Of Walls.

Who said it? I hope you won't get mad when I say this... But you aren't a strong person. so you can relate to how the weak feel. In addition, you excel in sizing up any situation. Isn't that why you immediately know what should be done?
Who said it? Why Are You In Such A Rush? We Haven't Even Had A Chance To Talk This Over!
Who said it? Most humans are weak, including me... but if i got an order from someone who saw things as I do... No matter how tough it was, I'd do my damnedest to carry it out
Who said it? I have no right to tell you how to live your life. So actually this is nothing more than a hope of mine. I want you to live a life you're proud of
Who said it? When I became a titan I thought nothing of it. I wanted to believe that strength was all mine. That's exactly how a weakling thinks.
Who said it? It might not be all they hoped for, but now.. Humanity has an ace up its sleeve.
Who said it? I'm sorry Eren I won't give up anymore. Once I'm dead, I won't even be able to remember you. So I'll win, no matter what. I'll live, no matter what!
